remarks: The underlying set of the product of two topologies.  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 31-Aug-2015.)
statement:
txval.1 $e |- B = ran ( x e. R , y e. S |-> ( x X. y ) ) $.

txuni2.2 $e |- Y = U. S $.

$d R x y $.
$d S x y $.
$d X x y $.
